extendedIngredients.name: almonds
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 cup chopped smoked or toasted almonds (see note at left)
extendedIngredients.originalName: chopped smoked or toasted almonds (see note at left)

extendedIngredients.name: celery root
extendedIngredients.original: 1 pound celery root, peeled and cut into matchstick-size slivers
extendedIngredients.originalName: celery root, peeled and cut into matchstick-size slivers

extendedIngredients.name: pear
extendedIngredients.original: 1 Asian pear (10 to 13 oz.), rinsed, cored, and diced
extendedIngredients.originalName: Asian pear , rinsed, cored, and diced

extendedIngredients.name: radicchio
extendedIngredients.original: 1 head radicchio (8 oz.), rinsed, halved, cored, and slivered
extendedIngredients.originalName: head radicchio , rinsed, halved, cored, and slivered

extendedIngredients.name: smoked trout
extendedIngredients.original: 8 ounces smoked trout, skinned and broken into bite-size pieces
extendedIngredients.originalName: smoked trout, skinned and broken into bite-size pieces

title: Smoked Trout-Celery Root Salad
summary: Smoked Trout-Celery Root Salad is a gluten free, dairy free, whole 30, and pescatarian main course. One serving contains 278 calories, 13g of protein, and 18g of fat. This recipe serves 6. For $3.3 per serving, this recipe covers 18% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have trout, celery root, dijon mustard, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the pear you could follow this main course with the The Pear Pie as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. This recipe from My Recipes has 1 fans. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 57%. This score is solid. Try Creamy Celery Root Soup with Smoked Trout, Smoked Salmon and Celery Root Bisque, and Potato and Celery-Root Gratin with Smoked Haddock for similar recipes.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix lemon juice, olive oil, mustard, and mayonnaise until well blended. Add celery root, pear, radicchio, trout, and green onions and mix to coat. Add salt and pepper to taste.                                                                                                 Spoon salad onto plates and sprinkle almonds on top, or mix in almonds and serve salad from bowl.

steps.step: In a large bowl, mix lemon juice, olive oil, mustard, and mayonnaise until well blended.
Add celery root, pear, radicchio, trout, and green onions and mix to coat.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon salad onto plates and sprinkle almonds on top, or mix in almonds and serve salad from bowl.
